Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: bedside lighting not strong enough for reading but that s probably my age Most people would not be bothered with the lighting in such a lovely bed
Positive_Review: Superb Queen Bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I have stayed at this hotel regularly for 7 years with great satisfaction Great location and setting But on the 2 occasions this year the room was not ready at the nominated check in time and the restaurant service was very poor I hope the management bucks up as I would miss not staying here on my visits to South London It is not cheap
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The restaurant was terrible Staff unfriendly Everything a hassle and food inedible I know it was Wimbledon tennis week but that is no excuse for the lack of service There seemed to be no overall manager and this was very noticeable
Positive_Review: The room

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No coffee in room no food available after tennis finished no complementary pick for return from tennis view from room was the conservatory roof
Positive_Review: Property and presentation

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The price inflated to over 3 times the normal rate for the fortnight because it is near the Wimbledon tennis event At 200 the deluxe double was disappointing having only the small round window at the front for natural light At over 3 times the price it was outrageously expensive Advantage well and truly taken The staff bored uninterested and far too few of them at breakfast On one morning we waited 30 minutes to get our drinks The few staff there were like headless chickens Slightly better on the second day as there fewer guests but still very poor Some tables were set properly ours wasn t Not fun eating cereal with a teaspoon Eggs not cooked as I requested When we arrived at our room there was a huge pile of laundry just outside the door not a good look on arrival At check out we weren t even asked how we enjoyed our stay just as well as the bored reception clerk was answering the phone It was a two star experience for 5 star prices
Positive_Review: Very handy for Wimbledon tennis event and cars were available to transport guests around Comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Rooms were comfortable although lighting poor Very well situated on Common with ample parking Staff were helpful and food was good Courtesy cars to tennis were a bonus

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: TV not working despite two visits from Hotel staff Big issue was the room temperature Air conditioning not working and despite two fans placed in the room it was extremely uncomfortable throughout our stay Being on the very front of the Hotel we were unable to leave windows open due to noise At over 500 per night this was most unreasonable and no offer to discount the room was made making our decision whether to us this Hotel chain again very easy
Positive_Review: Staff location food etc

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Hot courses served cold and when food returned the steak had been re grilled turning a medium rare into a medium The matter was handled well by the restaurant manager and we were not charged for the main course
Positive_Review: comfortable friendly hotel Attractive grounds and park Drop off and pickup at the Wimbledon Tennis Tournament Easy parking

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The tablets in the restaurant were dirty The personell were badly trained and organised difficult communication Very expensive
Positive_Review: Marvellously situated lovely gardens

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Ac was not working in our room and most of the windows couldn t open as jammed with paint They did give us a fan
Positive_Review: Comfortable bed lovely room Hotel lovely and great location Great breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Had to ask 5 times for a cup of tea Our plug in the bath was stuck in So we could not empty it Had to stand in cold water for two days We reported it but no one fixed it The safe broke with all our valuables inside No towels in bathroom
Positive_Review: Position and building

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: We came down for a drink around 6 pm and there was nobody in the lounge bar area but all the tables still had empty glasses on them Service very slow Breakfast same issue most of the tables empty but covered with plates etc from previous guests Asked for brown bread got white For lunch asked for a nicoise salad and the person behind the bar taking the order had no idea what that was At 4 pm asked for a full afternoon tea to be told there was none left even though it serves this until 5 pm It s a lovely property but the staff and service let it down sadly
Positive_Review: Beautiful property lovely bedroom very comfortable bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: The size and beauty of the room and it s surrounding views the politeness of the staff was exceptional The splendour of the hotel was greatly noted and the bed was heavenly had an amazing restful sleep

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I was in the Clos du Caillou room it was extremely noisy I could hear people outside in the hall loading a lift also slamming doors loud chatter as well it was staff for sure not guests constantly for almost an hour from 130 230PM I also had to wait for almost 10 minutes to check out because no one was at the front desk
Positive_Review: I loved the cosy feel of the hotel from the check in area to the bar area also the way to the rooms It felt very private quaint boutique like

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: A bit crowded at times and difficult to get in the restaurant
Positive_Review: Location was good for me there is a public park behind the hotel to walk in and parking is easy The rooms are well decorated clean and of a good size Bar was good and breakfast was excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Bit cheeky being charged 1 70 service to deliver a glass of wine 15 feet from the bar to our table
Positive_Review: Excellent location on Wimbledon Common lovely to walk into Wimbledon village if you aren t dining in the hotel which we couldn t as they were fully booked Lovely comfy beds with good quality bedding High quality bathroom with excellent bath and shower Fantastic breakfast with a beautiful view across the park behind the hotel The hotel were very good allowing us to leave the car the full day after we had checked out Overall excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Breakfast took an hour very slow service of cooked part I think there were staffing problems
Positive_Review: Comfy big bed very nice bathroom and bath especially

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Staff are unfailingly helpful and friendly It s a genuinely dog friendly hotel We ve visited at least 4 times and it s consistently excellent every time The location next to Cannizzaro Park is fabulous and Wimbledon village which is lovely is just a few minutes walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: as it was bank holiday the hotel was struggling to cope with demand in the restaurant lounge and getting a coffee and croissants was a lengthy process Our room was ok but being on the ground floor we had to tolerate the noise of people at the bar until about 2 am
Positive_Review: The location and grounds are very good

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I would have stayed more nights but the price shot up beyond my stay so we headed in to Cenral London of all places
Positive_Review: I am a regular at the hotel and always try to stay there when in Wimbledon unless the price shoots up to the ridiculous So obviously I don t find anything to really dislike The staff are always friendly and attentive and create a good ambiance to go with the decor and facilities

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Lighting wasn t great for applying make up even in the bathroom On 2nd floor and could hear music from party downstairs although it did stop by midnight
Positive_Review: Lovely setting in the park Nice rooms with good shower Staff were pleasant and helpful Free parking Walking distance to Wimbledon village and town centre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The hotel was rather shabby a lot of scuffed scratched walls and paint work floors not cleaned properly No quiet place to sit bar area full of hustle and bustle from staff We had to request a remote for the t v then we had to have someone reconnect the t v and for the rest of our stay you had to move close to the t v to change channels Breakfast on the first day not bad on second very poor Barely cooked tomato mushroom over cooked with leathery skin order was wrong waiter had to return with missing food still waiting for our toast even though we requested it twice had to ask for plates to be removed Not a relaxing experience Over priced hotel for what we received The reality did not match our expectations
Positive_Review: Set on Wimbledon Common the hotel had a nice out in the country feel whilst only a ten minute walk from the village The room we stayed in was large and the bed was very comfortable The hotel was easy to find The orangery used for meals including breakfast was a nice place to sit as it over looked park land

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Staff was helpful but occasionally not very knowledgeable about the services available at the hotel The free tea and coffee making facility we could not use as the coffee machine was unbelievably dirty At the time of booking the hotel advertised a free bicycle rental but it turned out the service was stopped a fair time back
Positive_Review: Hotel in very pleasant surroundings very nice for going for a run or for walks Nice room with two big windows comfortable bed Beautiful breakfast room

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: I travel with three large dogs and from the minute we arrive we are made to feel welcome and special The staff are amazing and with the park behind it is perfect Everything about this hotel is excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: This hotel was very comfortable and quiet and in a great location Free parking onsite was good No dislikes
Positive_Review: The staff were very welcoming and efficient Room was very clean and spacious The bar area was excellent and the barman made the best Old Fashioned The breakfast was excellent but for some may be a little small it was not a problem for me

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: All of our group complained that the bedrooms were unbelievably hot at night seemed to be no way of cooling the room down
Positive_Review: Excellent hotel great rooms lovely location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I didn t like was the en suite bathroom door which was mainly opaque glass panel surrounded by clear glass So you could see into the bathroom from the bedroom I would have preferred more privacy and a solid wooden door But it was not a big deal
Positive_Review: The bed was extremely comfortable and felt luxurious All the staff extremely helpful and efficient

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: It s the wedding season hotel is a popular wedding venue when there are wedding receptions certain public areas are closed off to the other guests reducing the facilities Wifi is really bad and if with 3 mobile service provider no signal in the hotel
Positive_Review: Surrounding park and woodlands close to Wimbledon village Friendly and efficient staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The staff were slow and rude Everything seemed like a lot of effort to them Everything seemed quite dated and in need of revamping repair The gate to exit the car park didn t work The food at breakfast was mediocre
Positive_Review: The bedroom was spacious and the bed very comfortable We had great views from the window but then we paid extra for a premium room so would expect this

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: service shocking at all times this is the third time I have a group of people 12 in total for meals and with rooms and unless something changes it will be the last
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Despite sitting in the dining area for 40 minutes I wasn t offered a breakfast nor tea I eventually asked for a tea and was brought one but no one came to the table to offer breakfast It was deducted on checkout once I d explained
Positive_Review: Location is fantastic and despite my breakfast disappointment we will be back

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Kettle facilities in room had to take out of wardrobe and balance on dressing table
Positive_Review: The night light in the bathroom so didn t wake each other in night

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Too few staff especially in the bar Those that were on duty in the restaurant were not trained and were not helpful
Positive_Review: Hotel rooms were lovely and location is great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Noise from the room over our room very active occupant creaking floor boards
Positive_Review: The free upgrade was a very nice surprise a room with a view one of the best in the hotel I should think

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Reception failed to record payment for 2 rooms Tried to charge again on booking out Breakfast poor and delivery slow Set menu for dinner disappointing
Positive_Review: The room was good quality

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The hotel is let down by the restaurant which is not typical of a HDV Staff seemed to be rushing around but not actually doing anything Several hot evening meals had to go back as they were cold this was rectified with alternatives quickly Service was also slow We all got the impression that the comments we were making were not unusual as they were greated with apathy Breakfast was also cold and had to be sent back
Positive_Review: On the plus side the bedroom was immaculate and the team all friendly and very welcoming

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The staff were helpful though one did wonder whether there were enough of them Service at breakfast was a little tardy though the quality of the meals was excellent
Positive_Review: The hotel was in an excellent location and provided everything we required for our two night stay The rooms decor cleanliness and comfort were all of a very high standard Whilst for some the cost would be quite acceptable and usual for a quality hotel in a Wimbledon setting we could just about see it as value for money The stay however was most enjoyable

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Our room was small staff were overwhelmed with numbers on saturday night in restaurant and hotel a number of requests were forgotten eg making up a sofa bed while we were at dinner
Positive_Review: The food was extremely good

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Our bathroom was very cramped My husband and I aren t very tall and even we struggled to sit on the loo without banging our knees on the bath
Positive_Review: A stunning location for us Bar and Restaurant staff were fabulous and we were looked after very well Sunday Lunch was excellent and we will definitely return

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Weddingshow on at the hotel on the Saturday when we arrived could not park just went round and round until someone left
Positive_Review: Convenient position for what we wanted

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The restaurant staff were very courteous and friendly but in my opinion the service was disjointed due to not having one person allocated to look after our table Thus resulted in having to remind any passing staff about certain things which took a bit longer to materialise than expected Service at breakfast provided a similar experience and toast was completely forgotten until well after the cooked breakfast was finished The complimentary Wi Fi in the room was so slow that I used mobile data for any Internet searches Streaming video from BBC News etc was not possible
Positive_Review: The location on the edge of Wimbledon Common was perfect A lovely building great room and very friendly welcome The bar was very relaxing with a big open fire The food was beautifully prepared and presented

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Not able to have a coffee in room milk was missing and the tea bags really weak decaf only or Earl Gray Noisy corridor 35 for two breakfasts Go to Wimbledon Village high st instead
Positive_Review: Beds were so comfy Very clean too Iron Ironing board in room Warm

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Heating was set and unable to be altered by us It got really hot during the night but there was nothing we could do A lot of hotels in the UK seem to overheat their rooms
Positive_Review: Lovely friendly and helpful staff Lovely room Comfy bed Coffee machine Free bottled water

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The fruit salad selection was poor at breakfast Waited 45 minutes for breakfast on 2nd morning more staff needed
Positive_Review: I liked the cooked to order breakfast Loved the comfy beds Loved the location and parking for car

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing I didn t like about my stay
Positive_Review: The staff was so helpful showed us to are room showed us round hotel where breakfast would be for morning they was perlite when asking them something so all round was a good stay

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location on Wimbledon Common close to the village Easy access to great walks shopping eating and drinking Lovely hotel comfortable clean and funky Really comfy bed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The dining room was not clean dog hairs everywhere The staff spoke very poor English and the service at breakfast was chaotic
Positive_Review: The location was ideal and Cannizaro is a lovely building

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Dining staff seem to be overwhelmed This is the only hotel where I have had to wait for a table at breakfast This is not surprising given how long it took for breakfast to be served The previous evening a few friends joined us for drinks in the orangery and staff seemed uninterested in whether we wanted anything We had all just eaten at The Ivy Chelsea Garden where the service was impeccable and this really show up their service
Positive_Review: Location by Wimbledon common is peaceful and great for getting out for walks but not close to the underground Hotel has a nice atmosphere and food generally very good with many other restaurant options in Wimbledon village

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing
Positive_Review: Everything was perfect for us I travel with my three dogs around Britain and Europe The staff welcomed the dogs in every way which makes for a relaxing trip for me

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: In some rooms The heating did not work properly and
Positive_Review: Receptionists were helpful but not enough in numbers for the holiday crowd Bar service was good so was the breakfast

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Could have done without the dog barking the whoke evening in the room opposite and the owners shouting at it to stop
Positive_Review: The views The coffee machine and fresh milk in room That the windows open Excellent service Love the Sunday special rate

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Hotel advised special occasion by my daughter but nothing special organized Very disappointing
Positive_Review: Location suited reason for trip to revisit church married in 60 years ago

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Luxurious feeling rooms with super comfy bed and extra deep bath tub Tea facility with lots of variety brew and quality coffee maker too Service was immaculate friendly and professional at the same time front the front desk to the bistro and even the housekeeping stuff who was ready to do us much or as less of our requirements We are looking forward to come back again soon

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I ordered porridge for breakfast but it took so long to come that I almost lost the will to live
Positive_Review: The setting in the publicly maintained Cannizaro Park is wonderful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The lighting in the suite difficult to read on the sofa and the mirror in the super bathroom not close enough or bright enough for shaving or applying make up Also the lighting by the dressing table not so bright as the lamp shades were black very smart but not bright
Positive_Review: Breakfast super we took the upgrade to a suite on arrival Service all good

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a bit of a hassle as they wanted us to eat in a side room as a guest of the hotel but we wanted to eat in the glass enclosed room We had to ask many times
Positive_Review: Everyone was very kind Hotel was beautiful and so warm and welcoming Room was superb Daniella at front really took great care of us and Fransisco was such a wonderful waiter in the bar area

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I paid for a late check out as I was working at an event until late afternoon but I received a call at 1 30pm saying I needed to vacate the room by 2pm which was very inconvenient and also not good value for money as the late check out cost me 55 Not very happy about that
Positive_Review: I needed a very early breakfast and the staff came up trumps with room service at 6am Very welcome indeed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The staff were polite but inefficient Meal orders were muddled and the bill a shambles Breakfast took over an hour to be served for our table of three I received and finished my meal in half an hour before my wife and cousin received theirs 45 minutes later I do not know what was happening in the kitchen but they needed a good sorting out Satnav took us to the back area in a narrow cul de sac by allotments Main entrance poorly signed Overall a poor experience for a table of six celebrating a birthday
Positive_Review: Good room size clean bed comfortable

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Internet was not working for 3 days and it was not fixed despite guest complaints The answer I was given was Even we do not have internet Seriously in year 2016 Definitely not value for money
Positive_Review: Location of the hotel and lounge area is good Nothing else

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The service at dinner was very poor and a couple of the staff were not friendly Also specifically asked for a particular table in the Bistro bar which I booked personally about 4 5 weeks ago and was given one in the Orangery restaurant It was my 20th wedding anniversary which was celebrated at the hotel 20years ago so I was very disappointed
Positive_Review: Lovely food comfortable big bed and location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I arrived late just about 10 00 pm but was told restaurant had closed at 10 00 pm Didn t want room service just wanted a drink and something to eat in a nice environment Disappointed not to have had a Hotel du Vin late evening meal Menu looked very nice
Positive_Review: Bathroom good excellent shower Breakfast nice but was an extra I asked to have breakfast in a lovely conservatory room but was told that hotel guests were served in a different room Not nearly as nice Thought that might have meant my breakfast was included in the room price but when I came to pay the bill it wasn t Why was I not allowed to sit in the conservatory with its lovely views

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Decor been changed to the hotel du vin trademark wallpaper and dark browny colours Much preferred brighter previous decor
Positive_Review: Lovely location and good food

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Lighting in bedroom poor during our stay breakfast service very poor bacon appalling and waitress service way below what it should have been
Positive_Review: General Manager very understanding and receptive regarding our comments front desk welcoming like the fact the hotel is dog friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The hotel is tired and tatty No lift to the room as it was down stairs Completely overpriced Did not use the restaurant as this was really over priced
Positive_Review: The hotel looks great from the outside The location is great when there is good weather Nice walk to Wimbledon village

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: One person on reception showing each guest to their room on arrival simply doesn t work we along with three other people waiting were left alone in reception for over 10 minutes and waited over 20 minutes before we could talk to anyone
Positive_Review: No Positive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The staff universally unfriendly in the bar and restaurant Really need to improve the service levels
Positive_Review: The comfort the parking the breakfast the size of the room and bathroom

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Watching dogs do their business whilst eating breakfast Could hear TV next door early hours of morning No view due to big tree covering window in journey s end room
Positive_Review: Fresh orange juice comfy bed and parking Staff very friendly and accommodating especially on reception

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Overall performance of staff seemed pretty poor Ordered lunch and waited a very long time when I went to chase it up I was offered my bill And then it still took another 10 mins Staff attending wedding reception did not appear to be particularly organised or efficient
Positive_Review: Lovely location rooms great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Should have numbers on the room doors not just fancy names Impossible to find rooms Lovely bathrooms but getting into very high sided baths a trifle difficult We did not know that until we arrived Not so good for the less abled
Positive_Review: Lovely location Staff very helpful and friendly and very hard working Would recommend

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: They was a wedding on and the hotel tried to contact us to tell us that but said they couldn t because booking com didn t show my email or telephone no We changed room as the room they had booked for us was right above the wedding We then booked dinner but when arriving for dinner they didn t have the reservation It seemed to us that the wedding had taken over the staff and they couldn t cope Also our room was very hot even though we changed aircon to 17
Positive_Review: Location for us was fantastic Breakfast was lovely

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The basket of treats with the price list inside it they all looked tempting and although high quality chocolates nuts crisps etc still a bit on the pricey side
Positive_Review: The Hotel is relaxing very clean and decorated to a high standard as are the bedrooms The large comfortable bed with superb quality sheets was my favourite I had two very good night sleeps The choice for breakfast was very good and the food was of a high standard It is on a lovely park with lots of walks and plenty of wildlife Looking forward to going back

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Breakfast room good but staff disorganized it took nearly 1 hour for breakfast to arrive some staff were rushed others did not care
Positive_Review: Not much a typical London hotel and quite expensive

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Paper thin walls Noise from television next door and phone kept us up until 3am Reception seemed unable to do anything about it
Positive_Review: The beautiful location and d cor of the hotel

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Unfriendly greeting on arrival disinterested staff delayed access to room beyond stated check in time Brusque reception at breakfast followed by uncoordinated and unprofessional service with tea delivered 30 minutes and food 45 minutes after being seated
Positive_Review: The location gardens and easy parking

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The lift had broken down but these things happen and staff went out of their way to ensure all bags were carried to and from rooms
Positive_Review: It is a lovely property that has wonderful old worked charm

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Ants in the bathroom sink overall cleanliness poor not enough waiting staff hard to get a drink let alone a table
Positive_Review: Location location location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Thought the food was quite poor overall for the cost Dinner was lacking in flavour and portion sizes not generous Service at breakfast was poor
Positive_Review: The room was very good and the bed very comfortable Lovely bathroom

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Welcome from staff on reception could have been warmer seemed a bit unprofessional compared to other similar hotels I have stayed in
Positive_Review: Lovely old building nice grounds very comfortable room good shower

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The breakfast was really disappointing My only gripe with the stay and even worse I paid extra for this on the day It was bland and tasteless Bacon in the omelettes hard and burnt It wasn t service with a smile service staff seemed grumpy Its not worth 17 each Only thing that ruined it for us
Positive_Review: Very comfortable rooms Reception staff good Great location on the common Lovely gardens for walking around Easily within walking distance to the village

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Service was very slow and sometimes positively unhelpful Aircon didn t cool and was not able to be fixed during our two night stay
Positive_Review: Lovely location in Cannizaro Park adjacent to Wimbledon Common

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Breakfast was ordered from menu not buffet style which might not suit all
Positive_Review: Room was modern and clean with good air con Beautiful setting with large park Close to Wimbledon village with its restaurants and bars Good value for what we paid

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Such a shame on this visit we were up in the eaves and the lift was broken we had to climb the stairs cross across the landing to the other side of the hotel then up another two flights of stairs and across the landing again Very popular normally plenty of parking space but a couple of times we struggled to find a space but it is a working hotel Had breakfast in the conservatory girl who served us was very nice but pretty useless as a waitress another couple at a table near were not happy with the time they waited for their breakfast which was strange because it was not that busy We ordered two eggs benedict at 9 45 a m Coffee arrived at table I had to ask the waitress at 10 25 where was the breakfast she apologised and said it would be one minute we ordered tea and more coffee as ours was cold The breakfast did show up and was excellent but the tea and coffee did not come until we had finished our breakfast which is strange because the bar with the tea and coffee is just across the room I have read lots of reviews about poor service at breakfast time and if Cannizaro want to be the best they really have to train their waiting on staff and preparers of beverages and food it was as if they staff were children and had no clue how to organise anything very strange When I booked out I was asked as usual was everything o k I mentioned the lift they had come to fix a problem but did not have part and had to order it and the time taken for the food to arrive apology but not compensation offered I will be writing to them direct It has not put me off this place I love it In our room they have a basket with crisps chocolate biscuits popcorn etc with price list and not cheap the basket was put in the window cill the sun was shining in all day I would not be happy buying any of these products knowing they had been sitting in very hot sun
Positive_Review: I absolutely love this place beautiful setting it was a joy to sit and have breakfast in the conservatory and look out onto the park and watch all the walkers and dogs having a great time Rooms excellent fully stocked with everything you would need for your stay Dog friendly place Very popular Excellent location Staff are very friendly

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: This hotel used to be the tops but has gone off a lot since changing hands The service was poor for example the reception desk was not staffed when we wanted to check out and the breakfast service was in the hands of a person who was stressed had no idea how to make the coffee and was very slow The impression is one of very busy juniors with lacklustre middle and senior management The rooms are OK just the d cor is somewhat bizarre and the furniture is on the old side Main problem with the rooms is the noise the doors don t close soft so you are woken by late comers and even the wardrobe doors close with a bang no matter how careful you are We have stayed here a lot but this time were very disappointed at over 300 per night we expected much more
Positive_Review: The location is fantastic right on Wimbledon Common great for walking the dog etc Backs onto a lovely park Bathrooms fairly new and work OK public places mediocre

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: 45 minute wait for breakfast not acceptable My wife informed reception when checking out Nobody seemed bothered considering the rack rate paid very disappointing
Positive_Review: Great dinner service very knowledgeable Sommelier

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Service at breakfast was dreadful Waitresses seemed trained to not look up didn t fulfil requests unless asked three times no manager in sight After a really pleasant night it was very disappointing and we were not the only ones to be complaining
Positive_Review: Great bed nice pillows pleasant array of room snacks and drinks Always love the rain forest showers

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Service for Sunday breakfast a bit slow and staff were rushed but they had had 3 weddings the previous day
Positive_Review: Gorgeous big bed with wonderful cool starched sheets Well stocked mini bar ice cold drinks and great snacks We arrived very late at night too tired for a proper meal nice to relax and unwind in a pleasant well furnished big bedroom with good refreshments and big embracing armchairs Also nice toiletries in the bathroom and lovely monsoon shower Characterful olde worlde ambiance Good parking Fabulous aspect of the Common from the dining room

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Better lighting in the bedrooms would have improved the experience
Positive_Review: The staff were extremely helpful and friendly The breakfast choices were also great

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing If it was around the 100 per night including breakfast we would have stayed longer
Positive_Review: Beds comfy room spacious and modern Staff very helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: We have stayed at this hotel before and always found it convenient and comfortable Lovely large room and also good sized bathroom Excellent food in the restaurant Very friendly and helpful staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Would have loved a swimming pool
Positive_Review: We found it all very luxurious but were really spoilt because of the exceptionally lovely weather and were able to sit out on the terrace with drinks until the early evening

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Made to feel really welcome by the staff the comfort and attention to detail was outstanding I had the most fantastic evening meal and felt really spoilt

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The staff are inconsistent some were very helpful and others were basically rude Service at breakfast was very poor
Positive_Review: The place is lovely and well kept the rooms are spacious and have everything you need The hotel also went the extra mile to help decorate the room as we were there for our wedding night

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Since the Cannizaro hotel was taken over by the Hotel du vin group the overall intimacy has vanished At the Cannizaro one never felf it was run as a business whereas the hotel du vin is definitely a business Having stayed there over the past 28 years I was sill asked if I had ever stayed before Our room was very nice although the refurbishment is dark with very poor lighting and for those of us with poor eyesight would benefit from a magnifying mirror in the bathroom
Positive_Review: Having stayed at this hotel over the past 28 years the location is good and a certain standard maintained The staff are extremely pleasant and very helpful

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Great location and as i booked mid week the rate was good too Always have a fantastic time at your venue whether it is merely for lunch or an overnight stay I ve yet to be disappointed

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: Thank you very much to Miss Erin is the manager of the hotel she makes me feel like home She has great hospitallity skills I really recomend this hotel Thank you

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Wallpaper books on bookshelf design not great made the room look a little dark
Positive_Review: Lovely hotel good welcome friendly staff nice clean room beautiful bathroom

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Poor level of cleanliness Breakfast sub standard and expensive Toast arrived after twenty minutes And two reminders Too late to eat Dirty knives dirty tables remains of other breakfasts caught on the wood Soap not replaced glasses by bed not washed final straw When we turned back our bed it had not been made On Saturday night man on the bar listening on his iPhone speaker to a match We indicated to staff nothing was done Finally on leaving the bar I suggested he get some earphones Very sad as we have stayed in this hotel a number of times and as yet a manager who was not there on our departure but who is aware of theses problems has not had yet had the manners or business acumen to contact me
Positive_Review: Staff very pleasant Good location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Our only complaint was that the check in took a long time as there were only two people on the desk and they had to take the guests to their rooms However the manager saw we had been waiting for some time and covered the cost of the taxi we took later that evening in recompense So an excellent offer we gratefully accepted
Positive_Review: The building was lovely and in a beautiful location We only had breakfast at the hotel but it was excellent quality and we were able to sit in the conservatory at the back overlooking the park blissful Staff very friendly We would definitely stay again

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Had to change the plugs on floor when you wanted to put the kettle on and then remember to put fridge back on
Positive_Review: Beautiful place excellent location very popular Staff are excellent Food excellent Bedding excellent

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: The friendliness of the bar staff and maintenance staff was outstanding a maintenance man willingly came to our room to fix something technical which we did not understand late at night Full marks

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Food was excellent and good value but wine beer etc a little expensive for the quality
Positive_Review: The staff were excellent in all departments especially the welcome on arrival and breakfast Good parking and surrounded by a lovely park ideal for a walk

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No bad experience
Positive_Review: Fantastic location especially for dog owners Good parking Comfy bed helpful staff we only had breakfast so cannot comment on other meals but what we had was fine

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Under the previous management the hotel was less corporate in feeling than it is now and the bread toast etc at breakfast was much better
Positive_Review: Very comfortable bed large room and spacious bathroom lovely park with beautiful views from dining room Charming waitresses

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Cheaper if you book direct than with booking com Booking com has a price guarantee but they make you phone them email them wait until after you stay send them the invoice blah blah blah Go to the hotel web site for best deals
Positive_Review: Fabulous setting lux rooms great staff

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: A little noisy until midnight or so but it was Christmas time Didn t see any wombles
Positive_Review: The hotel is very boutique and is sumptuosly fitted out Location wise it was fine for my purposes but would be harder for visitors without a car to get around as it is located on the Common and not more centrally in Wimbledon Staff were friendly and helpful Price was quite high but it was for work in London and I would expect to pay more here

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Payment requested on arrival probably because hotel concerned that they had allocated us a room above a party no mention of party at time of arrival or when booking The noise level was such that the floor of our room was shaking with the music a noise level which meant we couldn t talk to one another without shouting and when the music stopped there was an external door being used below our room which was continuously banging shut until 12 45am We subsequently noticed on another review site that this was not a new occurrence for this hotel and so we will not be returning and would not recommend it
Positive_Review: comfortable room

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: We arrived at 16 30 and the room wasn t ready so they offered us a free drink at the bar It took an hour to receive three coffees and that was with me chasing twice Breakfast took 1 5 hours to materialise in the morning
Positive_Review: The staff are friendly but they are so slow

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The wallpaper was very dark and the lighting quite low which in a room of this size meant it was quite dingy The room was called Kim something
Positive_Review: Beautiful setting and fantastically close to the shops and restaurants of Wimbledon village

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: There was dust on furniture The room was cold and when you turned the radiator on which you had to do my moving the radiator cover away from the wall it made a noise guests in the hotel were noisy up until about midnight Breakfast wasn t brilliant
Positive_Review: The room was nicely decorated

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: WiFi probably the worst I have ever encountered Didn t even work at all for a long time Only when I complained did they eventually look into this and to be fair eventually managed to start the WiFi
Positive_Review: Good location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Some of seats in bar uncomfortable for people with short legs
Positive_Review: Excellent friendly efficient staff Very good breakfast Large comfortable bed Nice location next to Common Good free parking

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Breakfast was a let down Poached eggs were very undercooked as was sausage Menus sounded better than theyou actually were

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: No Negative
Positive_Review: It was very convenient for us as we were visiting family close by They could join us for breakfast and were made very welcome Thank you for your hospitality

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The hotel was so hot I was boiling during the night and struggled to get the window open The bed was very comfortable but unfortunately I got a bad night sleep as a result of the heat The bar area is far too small especially for an establishment called Hotel Du vin It s almost like an after thought tucked to one side of the reception area very strange really Especially since the hotel must put on countless wedding receptions I would guess
Positive_Review: The location is great and the room was nice stylishly presented and comfortable with decent TV and shower But couldn t figure out how to cool the room down

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Design of the bed was too bulky for the room Bed too soft and bathroom small
Positive_Review: We loved the hotel and staff where very friendly We just found the bed too soft and the bathroom small Other than that we wld definitely go back

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: Nothing important
Positive_Review: Location near Wimbledon Common excellent service including at reception comfortable bedroom very pleasant leisurely Sunday lunch

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: breakfast took 2 hours to be given toast took 1 hour unbelievable rude staff at reception who bark at customers and each other cannot recommend this hotel
Positive_Review: location was nice however grounds are poorly maintained car park has very poor lighting

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: There were ants in the bathroom on arrival The air conditioner housing started to fall apart the toiletry holders in the shower were rusty Not expecting that for the money paid cheaper and better places to stay elsewhere in Wimbledon e g Dog and Fox
Positive_Review: Location

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: I just had no signal in my room which sucked but thank god for wifi

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
Negative_Review: The restaurant service is inconsistant very slow and staff don t listen Quality and presentation of food changes by the day and breakfast items are just thrown at you e g I ordered cheese without the charcuterie menu said 2 types of cheese I received a plate of sliced cooking cheddar One day I got 4 pieces of toast the next day I got 2 Hotel is very expensive for what it offers and does not reflect the Hotel du Vin branding Also if there is a function on it is difficult to get a table in restaurant even if you are resident
Positive_Review: The location decor and comfort of this hotel are great Staff are very willing but badly managed and trained

Hotel_Name: Hotel du Vin Cannizaro House Wimbledon
